mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into user (uid, name, password, is_admin, is_banned, gmt_create, gmt_modified) values (#{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{admin,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{banned,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update user set uid = #{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=CHAR}, is_admin = #{admin,jdbcType=TINYINT}, is_banned = #{banned,jdbcType=TINYINT}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, uid, name, password, is_admin, is_banned, gmt_create, gmt_modified from user
